2 days ago - Modafinil, sold under the brand name Provigil among others, is a central nervous system (CNS) stimulant and eugeroic (wakefulness promoter) medication used primarily to treat narcolepsy, a sleep disorder characterized by excessive daytime sleepiness and sudden sleep attacks.
December 24, 2024 - Modafinil (Provigil) is a medication that treats excessive tiredness caused by narcolepsy, sleep apnea and shift work sleep disorder.
